sub_title: To inspire collaboration and innovation, so that together we create a sustainable future
summary:
Open-minded adventurer, autodidact and entrepreneur with a broad perspective. I like to turn ideas into reality!

I learned through my experience that everything is possible with discipline, perseverance and most of all, a motivated team. Learning together, challenging each other and working towards a goal is key for a successful project or a thriving business.

In my "need", or "greed", to learn, I like to make new acquaintances. So don't hesitate to reach out if you want to talk business or other great adventures!

treasury_media.title: A completely new insurance proposition in only 12 weeks
treasury_media.description: Over 900.000 workers in the Netherlands are self-employed. Over 80 per cent of these workers have no incapacity insurance because they are hard to get by and expensive. However, every independent worker will need such an insurance in the near future as there is legislation coming into force that will make such an insurance mandatory.

projects.title: Projectmanager onzeleerling.nl
projects.description: walvi.nl (formaly known asonzeleerling.nl), a SaaS with USP privacy for primary schools in the Netherlands. Primarily a platform to communicate between schools and parents, plan meetings, correspond about sick leave, activities, news and more. I've been involved to guide the acquisition of new customers and roll out of the software with these new customers. In the meanwhile preparing the second version of onzeleerling.nl.

profile_positions.title: Service Designer

profile_positions.location: Valkenburg aan de Geul, Limburg, Nederland
profile_positions.description:
Bizzomate re-aligns business and IT by delivering organizations real agility and allowing them to fully take advantage of the continuously changing business environment. In order to realize this, Bizzomate provides a range of state-of-the-art methods and technologies for the fast and flexible development and deployment of innovative web and mobile business applications, both for the internal organization and the external user community. Mendix is an example of a high-tech model driven application platform which enables companies to build, integrate and deploy web and mobile applications faster and with better results, effectively driving ROI in days not months. (see link for some case studies). Bizzomate has offices in the Netherlands (Maastricht, Dordrecht), Belgium (Brussels) and the United Kingdom. 

Visit our website for more information: www.bizzomate.com
profile_positions.title: Scrummaster / Agile Coach

profile_positions.description: Mourik Infra B.V. is een betrouwbare en inventieve partner voor complexe infra. Wij ontwikkelen, ontwerpen, bouwen, beheren, renoveren en onderhouden projecten in Nederland voor de verbetering van de mobiliteit op land en water, het realiseren van de energietransitie en het aanpassen van ons land aan een veranderend klimaat. Dat doen we vanuit Groot-Ammers en Echt en vanuit onze locaties in Rotterdam, Hilversum, Waalwijk en Helmond. De betrouwbaarheid die we beloven en de complexiteit die we aankunnen is gebaseerd op de unieke combinatie van civiele en werktuigbouwkundige kennis en ervaring in één bedrijf. De mensen van Mourik Infra zijn inventief in samenwerking, materieelgebruik en digitalisering. Daarmee zijn we als geen ander in staat in korte tijd en met minimale hinder voor alle belanghebbenden een duurzame oplossing te realiseren. Mourik Infra B.V. heeft ervaring met wegen, dijken, bruggen, tunnels, afwatering, riolering, lucht- en waterzuiveringen, industrieterreinen, milieutechniek, saneringen en grondverzet, in landelijk gebied en binnenstedelijk.
profile_positions.title: Service Designer - TMS

profile_positions.description:
Mourik behoort tot de grotere zelfstandige familiebedrijven van Nederland. Een B2B-dienstverlener op het gebied van infrastructuur, industriële diensten, utiliteitsbouw en catalyst handling. 

Bijna 100 jaar na haar oprichting is Mourik een bedrijf met een omzet van 475 miljoen euro en wereldwijd 2.000 medewerkers. Mourik biedt klanten in de publieke en private sector een multidisciplinair pakket als totaaloplossing.

Mourik staat voor een gezond rendement, continuïteit, veilig werken en maatschappelijk verantwoord ondernemen.
Innovatiekracht, ondernemerszin, en hardwerkende, competente en betrokken medewerkers maken Mourik tot een toekomstgericht bedrijf.
profile_positions.title: Service Designer - Order2Cash (Opera)

profile_positions.description: The Young Universities for the Future of Europe (YUFE) is the top-scoring European University alliance, selected by the European Commission to develop and implement the first true student-centered, open, and inclusive European University. The YUFE Alliance is composed of ten young universities and four associated partners from the academic, non-governmental and private sector. Together, they hope to initiate a radical change by becoming the leading model of a student-centered, non-elitist, open, and inclusive European University. This will center on cooperation between higher education institutions, the public and private sector, and citizens.

profile_positions.description: In a complex of 24 apartments I'm the chairman for general meetings of Owner's Association and controlling all suppliers and our administration office. In addition to that I also provide technical advise on Y2Y maintenance plan and during negotiations with suppliers.

profile_positions.description: KLAV, het “Koninklijk Limburgs Apothekers Verbond”, is een dynamische beroepsvereniging met meer dan 1100 aangesloten leden en is zo één van de grootste beroepsverenigingen van het land. KLAV behartigt de belangen van haar leden op lokaal en nationaal vlak rond alle facetten van hun beroepsleven en is er zo voor de apothekers in Limburg maar zeker ook daarbuiten.
profile_positions.title: Service Design

profile_positions.description: The MediReva Group consists of a group of specialist enterprises in the field of health care. All the enterprises focus on delivering medical devices and care materials and, in this context, offering the required care and support to end users and health-care professionals. A specialist team of nurses, an extremely professional customer service, and a highly automated and optimized logistical chain form the heart of our organization.

volunteer_experiences.description: Responsible for a team of dedicated volunteers which provide press notifications, website content, social media content and public responses. Also involved in logistics during preparation and roundup of the event, organisational and hands-on. Check http://www.preuvenemint.nl for more information.

Advising Kern Zuid-Limburg, part of Stichting Downsyndroom, in organizing their efforts to expand the reach of information towards parents with a child suffering from downsyndrome.

This is part of the 10% employment with Bizzomate that is spend on social responsibility.
